title: when the game start loading it keep show error message "internet connection failed "
body:
actually i have nothing wrong with my internet connection and every thing fine , but i couldnt even reload the game , i restarted my laptop and tried to reconnect again but it show the same error , now i have ban for 5 games !!!
appreciate your support about this issue , it happen to me 2 times until now and i cant handle this issue , every time i get ban !!

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is failing to transition to the game servers after champion select.  Go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and fix up your connection to the game server.  Be sure to test it in a custom game to avoid any penalties.  I hope that helps!
